मित्रों, हमारी ज़िन्दगी में, शब्द बहुत मा: Mitraon, hamari zindagi mein, shabd bahut maayne rakhte hain. Dono hi din cheetah to wahi tha, usme wahi furti aur wahi taakat thi, par jis din use discourage kiya gaya, wo asafal ho gaya, aur jis din, encourage kiya gaya, wo safal ho gaya.
अगली सुबह, वो एक बार फिर शिकार के लिए नि: Agli subah, wo ek baar fir shikaar ke liye nikla. Kuch door jaane par, use ek boodhe bandar ne dekha, aur poocha, kahan ja rahe ho beta? Bandar mama, main shikaar par ja raha hoon. Cheetah bola. Bahut achhe, bandar bola, tumhari taakat aur gati ke kaaran, tum ek behad kushal shikari ban sakte ho, jao, tumhe jald hi safalta milegi. Yeh sun cheetah utsaah se bhar gaya, aur kuch hi samay mein, usne chote hiran ka shikaar kar liya.
एक नौजवान चीता, पहली बार शिकार करने निकल: Ek naujawan cheetah, pehli baar shikaar karne nikla. Abhi wo kuch aage hi bada tha, ki ek lakadbaggah use rokate hue bola, Are chhotu, kahaan ja rahe ho tum? Main to aaj pehli baar khud se shikaar karne nikla hoon!, cheetah romanchit hote hue bola. Lakadbaggah hansa, abhi to tumhare khelne koodne ke din hain, tum itne chhote ho, tumhe shikaar karne ka koi anubhav bhi nahi hai, tum kya shikaar karoge! Lakadbagghe ki baat sunkar cheetah udaas ho gaya, din bhar shikaar ke liye wo beman idhar udhar ghoomta raha, kuch ek prayas bhi kiye, par safalta nahi mili, aur use bhookhe pet hi ghar lautna pada.
एक दिन कुछ मछुआरे, सरोवर के तट पर आये, औ: Ek din kuch machhuaare, sarovar ke tat par aaye, aur machhliyoon ki bahutayat dekhkar, baatein karne lage, ki yahaan kaafi machhliyaan hain, subah aakar, hum ismein jaal daalenge. Unki baatein machhliyoon ne suni. Vyavhaaric buddhi ne kaha, humein fauran yah talaab chhod dena chahiye. Patle soton ka maarg pakadkar, udhar jungli ghaas se dhake hue jungli sarovar mein chale jaana chahiye. Madhyambuddhi ne kaha, praacheen kaal se hamare purvaj, thand ke dinon mein hi wahaan jaate hain, aur abhi to wo mausam hi nahin aaya hai, hum hamare varshon se chali aa rahi is parampara ko nahin tod sakte. Machhuaaro ka khatra ho ya na ho, humein is parampara ka dhyaan rakhna hai.
बहुत समय पहले की बात है, सुदूर दक्षिण मे: Bahut samay pehle ki baat hai, sudur dakshin mein, kisi pratapi raja ka rajya tha. Raja ke teen putra the, ek din raja ke man mein aaya, ki putron ko kuch aisi shiksha di jaaye, ki samay aane par wo raj kaaj sambhal sakein. Isi vichar ke saath, raja ne sabhi putron ko darbaar mein bulaya, aur bola, putron, hamare rajya mein naashpati ka koi vriksh nahi hai, main chahta hoon, tum sab char char mahine ke antaraal par, is vriksh ki talash mein jao, aur pata lagao ki wo kaisa hota hai? Raja ki aagya paa kar, teeno putra baari baari se gaye, aur wapas laut aaye.
मित्रों, हमारी असल जिंदगी में भी यही बात: Mitrón, hamari asal zindagi mein bhi yahi baat lagu hoti hai, hum kisi ko ek kshetra mein safal hote dekh, use copy karna shuru kar dete hain, hume lagta hai, ki yadi koi banda apne kshetra mein safal ho gaya, to hume bhi us kshetra mein safalta mil jaayegi, lekin hum shayad yeh dhyaan nahi dete, ki uske peeth par namak wali bori hai, matlab, uska interest alag hai, aur bhoolvash hum ruyi ki bori ko lade chhalang laga dete hain, matlab, doosra talent ya interest ko lade us kshetra mein safal hone ka khwaab dekhte hain, aur antatah, hume pachatana padta hai. Isliye, doosron ko dekhkar seekhna theek hai, par unka andha anusaran karna, us moorkh gadhe ke samaan vyavhaar karna hai.
सभी पुत्रों के लौट आने पर राजा ने पुनः स: Sabhi putron ke laut aane par raja ne punah sabhi ko darbaar mein bulaaya, aur us ped ke baare mein batane ko kaha. Pehla putra bola, Pitaji, wah ped to bilkul tedha medha, aur sookha hua tha. Nahin nahin, wo to bilkul hara bhara tha, lekin shaayad usme kuch kami thi, kyunki uspar ek bhi phal nahin laga tha. Dusre putra ne pehle ko beech mein hi rokate hue kaha. Phir teesra putra bola, Bhaiya, lagta hai aap bhi koi galat ped dekh aaye, kyunki maine sachmuch nashpati ka ped dekha, wo bahut hi shandar tha, aur phalon se lada pada tha. Aur teeno putra apni apni baat ko lekar aapas mein vivaad karne lage, ki tabhi raja apne singhassan se uthe aur bole, putron, tumhe aapas mein behas karne ki koi avashyakta nahin hai, darasal tum teeno hi vriksh ka sahi varnan kar rahe ho. Maine jaanboojh kar, tumhe alag alag mausam mein vriksh khojne bheja tha, aur tumne jo dekha, wo us mausam ke anusaar tha.
अतिबुद्धि नेँ गर्व से हँसते हुए कहा, तुम: Atibuddhi ne garv se hanste hue kaha, tum log ajnyaani ho, tumhe shaastroon ka gyaan nahi hai. Jo baadal garajte hain, ve baras te nahi hain. Phir hum log ek hazaar tareekon se tairna jaante hain, paani ke tal mein jaakar baithne ki saamarthya hai, humare pooch mein itni shakti hai, ki hum jaalon ko phaad sakti hain. Waise bhi kaha gaya hai, ki sankaton se ghere hue ho, to bhi apne ghar ko chhodkar pardesh chale jaana achhi baat nahi hai. Awwal to ve machhuaare aayenge nahi, aayenge, to hum tairkar neeche baith jaayengi, unke jaal mein aayenge hi nahi, ek do fans bhi gayi, to pooch se jaal phaadkar nikal jaayenge. Bhai! Shaastroon aur gyaanion ke vachanon ke viruddh, main to nahi jaaungi. Vyavaharikbuddhi ne kaha, main shaastroon ke baare mein nahi jaanti, magar meri buddhi kehti hai, ki manushya jaise taakatwar aur bhayaanak shatru ki aashanka sir par ho, to bhaagkar kahin chhup jao. Aisa kehte hue, vah apne anuyaiyon ko lekar chal padhi.
Ek sarovar mein teen divya machhliyaan rahti thiin. Wahan ki tamaam machhliyaan, un teenon ke prati hi, shraddha mein banti hui thiin. Ek machhli ka naam, vyavharikbuddhi tha, doosri ka naam, madhyambuddhi, aur teesri ka naam, atibuddhi tha. Atibuddhi ke paas, gyaan ka aseem bhandaar tha. Woh sabhi prakaar ke shastroin ka gyaan rakhti thi. Madhyambuddhi ko utni hi door tak sochne ki aadat thi, jisse uska vaasta padta tha. Woh sochti kam thi, paramparagat dhang se apna kaam kiya karti thi. Vyavharik buddhi, na parampara par dhyaan deti thi, aur na hi shastra par. Use jab jaisi aavashyakta hoti thi, nirnay liya karti thi, aur aavashyakta na padne par, kisi shastra ke panne tak nahin ulatati thi.
मैं चाहता हूँ, कि इस अनुभव के आधार पर, त: Main chahta hoon, ki is anubhav ke aadhar par, tum teeno baaton ko gath bandh lo. Pehli, kisi cheez ke baare mein sahi aur poorn jankari chahiye, to tumhe use lambe samay tak dekhna parakhna chahiye. Phir chahe wo koi vishay ho, vastu ho, ya phir koi vyakti hi kyon na ho. Doosri, har mausam ek sa nahi hota, jis prakar vriksh mausam ke anusaar sookhta, hara bhara, ya phalon se lada rehta hai, usi prakar, manushya ke jeevan mein bhi, utaar chadhaav aate rehte hain, atah, agar tum kabhi bhi bure daur se guzar rahe ho, to apni himmat aur dhairya banaye rakho, samay avashya badalta hai. Aur teesri baat, apni baat ko hi sahi maan kar us par ade mat raho, apna dimaag kholo, aur doosron ke vichaaron ko bhi jaano. Yeh sansaar gyaan se bhara pada hai, chaah kar bhi, tum akela saara gyaan arjit nahi kar sakte, isliye, bhram ki sthiti mein, kisi gyani vyakti se salaah lene mein sankoch mat karo.
